Generation VIII.Sword: The shaking of its freezing upper half is what generates its electricity. It has a hard time walking around.
Generation VIII.Shield: This Pokémon lived on prehistoric seashores and was able to preserve food with the ice on its body. It went extinct because it moved so slowly.

Generation VIII.Sword: Revive from Fossilized Bird and Fossilized Dino by Cara Liss on Route 6
Generation VIII.Shield: Revive from Fossilized Bird and Fossilized Dino by Cara Liss on Route 6
